statements: SELECT * FROM player_engagement_metrics WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT player_id, total_playtime FROM player_engagement_metrics WHERE total_playtime > 1000;
SELECT player_id, total_sessions FROM player_engagement_metrics WHERE total_sessions > 50 ORDER BY total_sessions DESC;
SELECT player_id, average_session_duration FROM player_engagement_metrics WHERE average_session_duration BETWEEN 30 AND 60;
SELECT player_id, last_login FROM player_engagement_metrics ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT player_id, total_sessions, total_playtime FROM player_engagement_metrics WHERE total_playtime > 1000 ORDER BY total_playtime DESC;
SELECT player_id, total_playtime, average_session_duration FROM player_engagement_metrics WHERE total_sessions > 5 ORDER BY average_session_duration ASC;
SELECT player_id, total_sessions, total_playtime, average_session_duration FROM player_engagement_metrics WHERE last_login BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, total_sessions, total_playtime, last_login FROM player_engagement_metrics WHERE average_session_duration < 60 ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT player_id, total_sessions, average_session_duration FROM player_engagement_metrics WHERE total_playtime < 5000 ORDER BY total_sessions DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_engagement_metrics
SELECT player_name, total_sessions FROM player_engagement_metrics ORDER BY total_sessions DESC
SELECT player_id, player_name, last_login FROM player_engagement_metrics WHERE total_playtime > 100
SELECT game_name, total_revenue, release_date FROM game_design ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT game_name, active_players FROM game_design WHERE active_players > 1000
SELECT player_name, total_sessions, total_playtime FROM player_engagement_metrics WHERE total_sessions > 10 ORDER BY total_playtime DESC
SELECT * FROM game_design WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT player_name, total_playtime FROM player_engagement_metrics WHERE total_playtime < 100 ORDER BY total_playtime DESC, player_name ASC
SELECT player_name, total_sessions, total_playtime FROM player_engagement_metrics WHERE player_id % 2 = 0
SELECT game_name, total_revenue FROM game_design WHERE active_players > 500 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM player_metrics;
SELECT player_id, logins, purchases FROM player_metrics ORDER BY purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_levels WHERE difficulty > 3;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE creation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT level_name, difficulty, campaign_id FROM game_levels ORDER BY level_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, total_playtime, logins, purchases FROM player_metrics WHERE purchases > 1000 ORDER BY purchases DESC
SELECT player_id, total_playtime, logins, purchases FROM player_metrics WHERE logins BETWEEN 10 AND 20 AND total_playtime > 500 ORDER BY total_playtime DESC, logins ASC
SELECT level_id, level_name, difficulty, campaign_id FROM game_levels WHERE difficulty >= 3 ORDER BY level_id ASC
SELECT player_id, feedback_text, creation_date FROM user_feedback WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY creation_date DESC
SELECT player_id, total_playtime AS playtime_hours, logins, logins * 0.5 AS avg_logins FROM player_metrics WHERE total_playtime < 1000 ORDER BY playtime_hours ASC
SELECT * FROM player_info;
SELECT player_name, age FROM player_info ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, registration_date FROM player_info WHERE age > 20;
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM game_info;
SELECT player_id, game_id, activity_type, start_time, end_time FROM player_activity ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT player_name, age, registration_date FROM player_info ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_activity WHERE activity_type='login' AND end_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT game_name, genre, release_date FROM game_info WHERE genre='RPG' ORDER BY release_date ASC;

SELECT player_name, game_name, feedback_text, rating, feedback_date FROM player_info JOIN player_feedback ON player_info.player_id = player_feedback.player_id WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(age) AS oldest_player_age, MIN(age) AS youngest_player_age FROM player_info;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level, registration_date FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(session_id) AS num_sessions FROM game_sessions GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE event_type = 'login' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM players LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 5 ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT player_name, registration_date FROM players WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions JOIN players ON game_sessions.player_id = players.player_id WHERE session_duration > 60;
SELECT event_type, COUNT(event_id) AS event_count FROM game_events GROUP BY event_type HAVING event_count > 5 ORDER BY event_count DESC;
